resources.string: 您知道食素如何维持身心健康平衡吗？\n Do you know how to keep healthy and pleasant as a vegan?
您知道如何通过简单的方法做出美味营养 的家常素食吗？\n Do you know how to prepare a simple and nice vegan meal for your family?
您知道食素一天能拯救多少生命吗？\n Do you know how many lives you can save for one vegan day?
您想找到更多食素的朋友一起交流吗？\n Do you want to make more vegan friends?
莲花素社，素食健康、美食、公益交流 平台，在此真诚 召唤全球素食者回归!\n Lotusite,a vegan lifestyle platform for health,food and public welfare,sincerely call together all the vegans now!
